short_summary: Wharf Repairs at St. Lewis, NL
description: Wharf Repairs at St. Lewis, NL. The scope of work includes furnishing all plant, labour, equipment and material for wharf repairs. Up to 13 new bollards and materials will be installed. 10 fixtures will be removed and replaced.",
full_summary:
# Wharf Repairs - St. Lewis, Newfoundland & Labrador

# Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-8867-17600671
* **Solicitation Number:** 30004839
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-25T14:00:00
* **Contract Award Date:** After tender closing date
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-02
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

## Project Description

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting proposal for the Wharf Repairs project at St. Lewis, Newfoundland & Labrador. The proposed scope of work includes demolition and removal of required components, replacement of existing top horizontal hardwood fender, removal and replacement of existing electrical trench concrete and concrete deck repair.

Other aspects of the project include:

* Refurbishment of Type A and B1 mooring cleat anchor blocks
* Supply and installation of new mooring rings
* Removal and disposal of existing slipway hardwood runners and concrete foundation and support blocks
* Supply and placement of new rock fill and granular materials for the new upland area

## Site Familiarization

It is the bidder’s responsibility to familiarize themselves with the site and its surroundings to assess the risks, contingencies, and other circumstances which may influence or affect the project.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

## Contractor Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Tammy O'Toole
	+ Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 550-1758

## Bid Submission

Please submit your bid electronically through the CANADABUYS portal. All supporting documents are available on this portal. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the procurement team.

# Important

Please note that the tender is for qualified bidders only. Interested bidders must first qualify before submitting a tender document. This tender is subject to all applicable laws and regulations.

# Closing Date

The tender closing date is 2023-09-25T
